title: The small, nimble 2026 car that F1 rejected: ‘We ended up with a camel!’
summary: F1 drivers have been complaining about the heavy, technical cars they'll be racing from 2026. Now a tantalising glimpse of a smaller alternative has emerged

qa_pairs.question: What significant change is expected in Formula 1 cars starting in 2026?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The cars will be heavier and more technical.
wrong_options: The cars will be smaller and lighter.
The cars will have more powerful engines.
The cars will use alternative fuels.

qa_pairs.question: What did drivers express dissatisfaction about regarding the 2026 F1 cars?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The heaviness and technical complexity of the cars.
wrong_options: The lack of speed in the cars.
The color design of the cars.

qa_pairs.question: What term is used in the discussion to describe the car that was rejected?
